title: shree vishvEshwaraa
sahitya:
shrI vishvEshvarA jaya sarvEshvarA


anupallavi

 sEvita suraagamNa cinmayAnanda guNa dEvI sahita shiva shrIkaNTha dEvadEva

caraNam
 sharavaNatAta sajjanObhEda kurusham mama shrI kumbhajAdinata
 nara vAhana priya nArada mukhAshraya hara hara sarvEsha harikEsha jagadIsha
